summary: This mod adds "Saruman The White" to the Game!
descriptionHtml:
Hello Guys,

I proudly present my version of "Saruman The White", as he appears to look like in the "Lord of the Rings Movie" I hope I succeeded to match his look, and hope you guys will enjoy him as a follower or as a modders-ressource.
There is no quest or storyline, I just came up with the idea and wanted to share the result.
He stays in "The Bannered Mare" in Whiterun and is wearing dark clothes, when u first meet him.
_________________________________________________________________________

[b]Needed DLC and or other MODS:

[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18839/?][b]LOTR Saruman Staff by Quechus9[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?][b]Apachii Hairstyles[/b][/url]
You need the latest Update of Skyrim
You DON 'T need any DLC!
_________________________________________________________________________

[b]PERMISSION:
[/b]
If you like to add this follower to your own project, just inform me about it, give credit and provide a link to this mod. 
_________________________________________________________________________

[b]THANKS TO:
[/b]
[b]Ian Joseph[/b] for permission to use his white robes in my mod!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47170/?] [b]White Robes and Hood by Ian Joseph

[/b][/url]
[b]Quechus9[/b] for his well made version of sarumans staff!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18839/?] [b]LOTR Saruman Staff by Quechus9
[/b][/url]Thanks to Appachii for the hairstyle i added to Saruman!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?][b]You need Apachii Hairstyles[/b][/url]
_________________________________________________________________________

[b]PLEASE ENDORCE AND COMMENT!
[/b]
[b]Have fun and kick some...!
Viel Spaß beim draugr plätten![/b]
[b]Dest.[/b]
author: Destero
